text: The Spelling Manor is a 55,000sqft\5380sqm chateauesque mansion in the ritzy Los Angeles, California neighborhood of Holmby Hills. The house is best known for having been the most expensive house in the US, once selling for us$150million. Among the property's features include a gift wrapping room, bowling alley, rooftop rose garden, three swimming pools, a koi pond, etc. Category:Buildings and structures in Los Angeles
title: Spelling Manor
